title: I Love Trouble (restored, with intro and outro) (1948, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: I Love Trouble (restored, with intro and outro) (1948, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: I Love Trouble is a 1948 American film noir crime film written by Roy Huggins from his first novel The Double Take , directed by S. Sylvan Simon , and starring Franchot Tone as Stuart Bailey. The character of Stuart Bailey was later portrayed by Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. in the television series 77 Sunset Strip .
